title: Critical period acquisition of second languages

content.question: Research on a critical period during the acquisition of second languages indicates that which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: The older an individual is, the more difficulty he or she will have with second-language pronunciation.
Children have a more difficult time than adults understanding the grammar of the second language.
Articulation of difficult sounds in the second language is easier for adults than for children.
Adults acquiring a second language typically speak with less of an accent than children acquiring the same second language.

content.answer: The older an individual is, the more difficulty he or she will have with second-language pronunciation.
